Text: Geir is a maculine name commonly given in Norway and Iceland.

1:
--------------------
Text: Geir:  It is derived from Old Norse "geirr" "spear", a common name element in Germanic names in general, from Proto-Germanic "*gaizaz" (whence also Old High German "gêr", Old English "gâr", Gothic "gaisu").
Triplets:<Geir
